info.name: Clinic Management System - Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Smart Lite Healthcare Management System with all 14 sections organized by functionality

body.raw:
{
  "patient": "patient_id_here",
  "doctor": "doctor_id_here",
  "appointment": "appointment_id_here",
  "diagnosis": "Common Cold",
  "medications": [
    {
      "name": "Paracetamol",
      "dosage": "500mg",
      "frequency": "Twice daily",
      "duration": "5 days",
      "instructions": "Take after meals"
    },
    {
      "name": "Vitamin C",
      "dosage": "1000mg",
      "frequency": "Once daily",
      "duration": "7 days",
      "instructions": "Take with water"
    }
  ],
  "notes": "Patient should rest and drink plenty of fluids",
  "status": "active"
}

{
  "patient": "patient_id_here",
  "appointment": "appointment_id_here",
  "amount": 500,
  "paymentMethod": "cash",
  "paymentType": "consultation",
  "status": "completed",
  "description": "Payment for general consultation",
  "notes": "Patient paid in full"
}

{
  "user": "user_id_here",
  "title": "System Maintenance",
  "message": "The system will undergo maintenance on Sunday from 2 AM to 4 AM",
  "type": "system",
  "priority": "high"
}

{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "subject": "Excellent Service",
  "category": "appreciation",
  "message": "I had a wonderful experience at your clinic. The staff was very helpful and professional."
}

{
  "name": "Jane Smith",
  "email": "jane@example.com",
  "subject": "Appointment Delay",
  "category": "complaint",
  "message": "My appointment was delayed by 30 minutes. Please improve scheduling.",
  "priority": "high"
}

item.name: Get My Activity Logs with Filters
